items.name: Apple-Cilantro Tacos with Creamy Plum Sauce
instructions: Step 1: Thinly slice the apples and chop cilantro.
Step 2: In a bowl, mix Philadelphia cream cheese with Roland plum paste until smooth. Season with lime juice.
Step 3: Heat Mission flour tortillas in a dry pan until warmed.
Step 4: Spread creamy plum sauce onto tortillas. Top with red cabbage, sliced apples, and chopped cilantro.
Step 5: Drizzle olive oil over tacos and season with a pinch of salt and ground pepper.

items.name: Red Cabbage and Apple Slaw with Maple Dressing
instructions: Step 1: Thinly slice red cabbage and apple.
Step 2: In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, and maple syrup.
Step 3: Toss red cabbage and apple with dressing, seasoning with a pinch of salt and ground pepper.
Step 4: Let sit for 10 minutes before serving to meld flavors.

items.name: Minty Citrus Salad with Spiced Seeds
instructions: Step 1: Toss arugula and mint leaves in a large salad bowl.
Step 2: Segment the orange and squeeze lime juice over the salad.
Step 3: Toast almonds and sunflower seeds in olive oil until fragrant.
Step 4: Sprinkle toasted seeds over the salad.
Step 5: Add a pinch of salt and ground pepper before serving.

items.name: Bell Pepper Stir-Fry with Pickled Twist
instructions: Step 1: Slice mixed bell peppers.
Step 2: Heat olive oil and sesame oil in a pan over medium heat.
Step 3: Add bell peppers to the pan, stir-fry until softened.
Step 4: Add pickled vegetables and stir well.
Step 5: Beat eggs and add to the pan, scramble with vegetables.
Step 6: Garnish with fresh cilantro and season with a pinch of salt and ground pepper.

items.name: Fruity Citrus Smoothie
instructions: Step 1: Peel and slice banana and pear.
Step 2: Juice the orange and lime.
Step 3: Blend banana, pear, and citrus juices until smooth.
Step 4: Add a splash of sparkling water for fizz.
Step 5: Sweeten with honey if desired.
